name: SwissStampTax.json
title: Swiss Stamp Tax
description:
This GraphQL query uses an International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) as an identifier type to return the Swiss Stamp Tax data on the specified instruments. The query uses the DerivedContentGovCorpBonds top-level query from the Derived Content content set.
The query demonstrates how a user can provide a list of instrument identifiers in the query variables rather than PermIDs.

samples.name: GraphQl query to return the Swiss Stamp Tax data

handlebars_config:
{{#each DerivedContentGovCorpBonds}} {{/each}}
ObjectId Identifier type ID Asset type Swiss domestic
entity		 Liable for Swiss
Stamp Duty Tax		 Taxation comment Taxation type
{{this.ObjectId}} {{this._metadata.identifierTypeName}} {{this._metadata.identifier}} {{this.SwissStampDutyTax.AssetTypeDescription}} {{this.SwissStampDutyTax.IssuerDomicileText}} {{this.SwissStampDutyTax.SwissStampDutyFlag}} {{this.SwissStampDutyTax.TaxationComment}} {{this.SwissStampDutyTax.TaxationType}}
